website_summaries.verdict: This entry-level rollator from Medline includes many of the features found in higher-end model. We wouldn't recommend it for outdoor use, but the wheels provide a smooth ride on indoor surfaces.
cons: Brake issues are a common concern
Not ideal for outdoor use on rough terrain

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, New found level of freedom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rollator for my grandpa. It was delivered last night and was easy to put together and feels very sturdy. At first my grandpa was against the rollator saying he just needs a cane. After about 5-10 minute he fell in love, he actually sat in the chair part of the rollator instead of his dining room table. I stopped by his house this morning to check on him and he is still a hug fan of the product. Thank you for such a great product at a great price. My grandpa now has a new sense of freedom.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for a international trip. It's very sturdy and easy to assemble. The seat isn't the most comfortable but it's good for short breaks here and there. The only con is the hand breaks. My dad has trouble remembering to firmly squeeze both sides and then sit down. The walker tends to slip away from him. I wish they had kickstand breaks or something the put his feet on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara7272

customer_reviews.title: This Rollator was delivered on Oct. 12, 2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: This Rollator was delivered on Oct. 12, 2017 and now Jan. 7,2018 only 3 months later the handbrake has broken. The return window has closed and now I don't know what to do. I would think it would be under warranty but what a pain now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Wheels cracked
customer_reviews.text: This was purchase for my mother 6 month ago .The wheels cracked while my mother was sitting on the seat. Shefell Would love to return it.
customer_reviews.author: JTDiaz

customer_reviews.title: should not be rated for up to 350lbs
customer_reviews.text: 2 months and the leg where the wheel inserts is cracked. Should not be rated for "up to 350lbs"., more for 200lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Terrasita

customer_reviews.title: Narrow seat space not suited for larger people.
customer_reviews.text: I like the walker. It was built sturdy which is what I wanted. However it is very narrow and I can not sit on it, which is what I was purchasing one for. I will be keeping it, either to trade for a larger one or to use later if I continue to lose weight. I am disappointed that they did not give more seat space.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This is how she rolls!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for Grandma (100lbs.) Sturdy, stable, folds, brakes, seat, storage!! She was using a regular folding walker with 2 wheels in the front. After 2 days of walking around the block with that one, the back legs were 2" shorter than the front!!! She was grinding the metal legs down on the pavement!! Tennis balls and "walker skis" were useless. She uses this to come and go to dialysis. The only thing this rollator does not have is a foot rest. I solved that by taking cable ties and linking them together and tying them to the frame. This keeps the ants off her feet when she wants to sit and take a rest.
customer_reviews.author: example

customer_reviews.title: Was good until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Was good until it broke. I only had it a couple of months and had to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Medline Steel Foldable Adult Transport... Medline
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 90 year old mom in assisted living. Really great combination of walker, seat and storage bag. The brakes are difficult to engage for someone with weak hands. There was a clicking when moving but that was easily fixed by moving the wire near the wheel. The cord/strap that is hanging and doesn't seem to belong is a type of handle - pulling it up is an easier way to fold the walker. Liked it so much we purchased another one for home in the event we need one.
customer_reviews.author: SAR TP

customer_reviews.title: Brakes are defective
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my 90 yr old mother and the brakes do not work. Had the manufacturer send out the new brakes and they were unable to be installed correctly. trying to get her another one but the box was thrown out during assembly in another city.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen svidron

customer_reviews.title: Free to move again!
customer_reviews.text: Received this great product on Thursday. The box arrived and was very easy to very easy to put together. I have able to get around much easier with this roller walker. It folds up easy to put in the car but I wish it could be a little lighter though. I was out at the grocery store and a restaurant this weekend and found this product to be a life saver and help me get around.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasTS

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months the wheels started wobbling and in a little over a year the bearing casing in a wheel collapsed all together, sending bearings scattered all over the floor. Don't buy this unit. My wife is a little over 100 lb., so the unit did not have to bear up enormous weight. Drive has a better product, but our favorite is the Pro Basics Transport Rollator, which can be used either as a wheelchair or a walker, which is especially handy when going to stores or other places.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Lowther

customer_reviews.title: Love my rollator
customer_reviews.text: Love my rollator! Nice looking. Quality handles. Sturdy. I'm a large woman, just under 300lbs, the rollator holds secure when I sit to rest. Recovering from knee surgery, It's nice to have and the color is a subtle dark burgundy, not bright and garish like others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Elle C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this burgundy colored walker for a lady I met through my job. The walker she had wasn't even worthy of a dumpster. I gave this new one to her today and when I watched her walk away, she looked like a different person and I'm not kidding. It was super easy to put together, did it while I was at work and took just minutes. Everything worked nicely. My mind and my heart feel so much better now. And I owe a lot of thanks to the folks who responded to my question about this walker.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price....wheels are slick so you have to be careful on hardwoods or tile. But good for an economical walker. Not good for a person who would not know how to put on the brakes to stop or lock it to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: WSK

customer_reviews.title: Strong and light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, very maneuverable little walker. I bought one that was twice the price but was heavy and not any stronger. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sloop5

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used, it saved me ,$8.00 however it was missing the bolt to put on right side brake/ handle bar fortunately I was able to camabalize a usable part from my previous broken rollalator. Also after purchasing this model I notice exact sa!e model at a familar big chaim supermarket is selling exact model new for $50.00. Anyway it is what it is. O buy the way the down tube where the bake assembly fits in was bent some. I was able to fix that too. Buyer beware of you buy used be ready to encounter problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother and she hasn't even had it two months and one of the wheels busted off. It has only indoor use on carpet and hardwood floors. Very cheap craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Warner

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I love the little area for storage, it helps to have a place to put my pocketbook when I need to sit. Very sturdy, a little hard to close, but manageable. It doesn't fit in my trunk but will slide into the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: J'Ess

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in 2017 for my elderly mother, who suffers from mobility issues. She has used it every day since then to help her get around her apartment, as well as a place to set a coffee cup or plate when she is sitting in a chair watching TV. It was easy to assemble. It is also easy to fold, lift and stow in my car trunk when we go somewhere. Mother frequently remarks about how much she loves her little "cruiser." This was definitely one of the best purchases that I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Aspasia Darkstone

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother who cannot walk for long periods of time. She loves it! She weighs about 140 pounds and this walker supports her weight without issues. This walker is lightweight, folds easily and fits in the trunk of a compact car with room to spare. Most importantly, my mom finds the seat comfortable and convenient. The wheels can be locked and the walker also has hand breaks. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy's Tropical Garden

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, better price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 93 yo mother, to have a one that could remain in the car, while another stayed in her house. Except for a minor difference in the handles, (and being $100 cheaper!) it is identical to the one purchased from a local medical supply house.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: I ordered in Nov 10th today wheel came off. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered in Nov 10th today wheel came off. I got it because I had back surgery in Dec. I will not be able to use it now because it is unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Vera M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with people over 6'
customer_reviews.text: Even with arms fully extended I find that your back is bent over most of the time, you get used to it after a few weeks. But keep away if you are 6' foot or taller. The other "nit" is that the tires are a bit too small and when you use it on a sidewalk sometimes the front wheel gets caught in the sidewalk and you have to manually lift the walker up to continue. The device is reasonably built but will see if it survives 6 months of outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Ps2os2

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I got this because it has come in very ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I got this because it has come in very handy recovering from foot surgery. It is easy to maneuver. It was easy to assemble. I love it. Only thing I would improve is a wider seat. Should be nearly as wide as the walker. Bag could be bigger also. Otherwise great walker.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Concerns about sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: The walker was easy enough to assemble, folds quickly, and seems to maneuver just fine. I do however have concerns about how sturdy it is going to be considering even completely tightened up, the handles are wobbly -possibly because they had to be raised to the last setting to be high enough. This individual has severe limitations with balance and coordination and hits everything in his path... We will have to see how long the equipment can tolerate his daily use...
customer_reviews.author: Client of MarcFirst

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy & I am using it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy & I am using it. I have the light weight aluminum walker, but this one makes it so much easier to carry things from room to room. I do not use the seat to sit on, but will use it to move items in the pouch under the seat & on the seat. It is wider than the light weight walker with out wheels & it will not go through the bathroom door unless you have a wider door opening.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick and easy. Folding not an issue. Light enough to pick up and place where needed, such as vehicle. I bought two of these walkers. One is at home, and the second is at my sisters home in Las Vegas. Recently I spent three weeks in Las Vegas and the walker proved valuable and was used wherever I went with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Robles

customer_reviews.title: The quality was poor and the one wheel is bent which makes the ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality was poor and the one wheel is bent which makes the walker here to manuever. Had to buy a whole new one. Poor!!! Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: LinaPinah

customer_reviews.title: bought it for my Mom and she loved it. She said that she could only get ...
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my Mom and she loved it. She said that she could only get a used one for this price and it wasn't as good.
customer_reviews.author: DianeParto

customer_reviews.title: Medline was wonderful to work with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Medline Rollator Walker for my Mother who is in Assisted Living. When I was putting it together I saw I was missing a washer. So I called Medline and asked if they could just send a washer. The very next day I received a whole new walker. I thought there might be a mistake and didn't want to be billed for another walker so I called them back and a very nice lady, Natasha, looked it up and said the Rollator was replaced at no charge. I would buy from them again. They were very helpful and fast. And very nice walker!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: I can't find a customer service number and would like to exchange it but the item is too large ...
customer_reviews.text: I just took it out of the box and the plastic on the seat is torn. I can't find a customer service number and would like to exchange it but the item is too large for me to return as we have no UPS here. The only box to exchange says they will charge your account again if you do not return the item with in 30 days. I am very disappointed as I thought my 90 year old grandmother would have a rollator today.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jackson

customer_reviews.title: higher priced rollators but this one is a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: There are higher quality, higher priced rollators but this one is a great value for the money. Well made, looks good, at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Henard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good value
customer_reviews.text: Great walker. I used this to walk After surgery it was heavy duty and light. I weigh over 300 lbs and it was able to hold me safely. Good brakes although I wasn’t racing
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Pennick

customer_reviews.title: Nice walker if you are not very tall.  It does its job but I wish it would adjust a little more
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but I wished it were a little taller when the handles are fully extended. It seems like when you extend the handles to the highest point they are not as secure as I would like them. Also the back bar would be nice if it folded up to put in the car so it takes up less space. I need to remove it completely to make room in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: T. Aman

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT HELP FOR PEOPLE WHO NEED HELP WALKING.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality with ease of operation. My husband loves it. It is easy to load into the car and easy to operate in stores. Would recommend this to anyone who needs assistance with walking.
customer_reviews.author: BETTY MEDINA

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Rollator
customer_reviews.text: This rollator was easy to assemble and adjust. Its strong, lightweight and easy to use. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Retiree

customer_reviews.title: ... walker but this one is the one he likes best because it fits through narrow spaces he could not ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a larger walker but this one is the one he likes best because it fits through narrow spaces he could not get through with larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice F. Wachtveitl

customer_reviews.title: Helped my grandma 👵
customer_reviews.text: This product helped my grandma with her walking problem and I love how it is so easy to build and set up its very sturdy and high quality for the price I’ve seen other chairs like this and they break within 1 month of usage which can be pretty dangerous but my grandma has had no problem walking with this for the past 2years and 5 months
customer_reviews.author: jair vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Fell Off Within Six Months
customer_reviews.text: My mom liked this walker and only used it when she left her home. So, its use was light to moderate. However, within six months, the wheel fell off. Very glad she was not leaning on it at the time. I see now it's too late to return. So it goes...
customer_reviews.author: Charles Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great value if you’re average height and weight
customer_reviews.text: Nimble and maneuverable because it’s lightweight. Highest hand grip adjustment is 36 inches from floor. Took me 5 minutes to assemble and adjust it out of the box. Perfect walker for my recovery from illness.
customer_reviews.author: C. Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice rollator was pretty much put together te rest was a snap , This is a great buy , The medical profession are nothing but crooks I looked at quite a few places and they were seling these for $ 200.00 Compaired to this $ 45.00
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR A TOURING TRIP!
customer_reviews.text: I removed the back rest and it was perfect for a week long touring trip to Washington DC. It was very easy to get it in and out of Uber cars of all sizes. I could not have made this trip without it. I would recommend this to anyone with difficulty walking!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M.

customer_reviews.title: Essential for long outings
customer_reviews.text: Makes airports possible and even comfortable. Use it clear down the jetway and gate-check quickly, then it's first off and waiting for you at the plane door. I didn't give it five stars because it is too awkward to use it for short car trips, but it's essential for long outings.
customer_reviews.author: Tarey

customer_reviews.title: The basket is a great touch, they can sit on it and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these - one for my own Mom and one for my MIL, both of whom have had health challenges. The basket is a great touch, they can sit on it and the brakes are good. They were put together easily by my husband. The sleek design and attractive dark red color was appreciated by both ladies. A qualify product at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem with frame
customer_reviews.text: I brought one for my mother last year in January . Frame gave way and wheel came off my mother to flip off the chair. Called company waiting on a response. They told they would get back with me with in 2 day. No response. Call today they're closed on weekend. Very dissatisfied right about with company but they did give a reference number. So I'll back Monday .
customer_reviews.author: David Rice III

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very sturdy! Works well for my Grandfather to go outside more and when he get tired and needs to sit down, he can!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are fragile
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box within minutes of receiving and one of the wheels had all three spokes broken. The manufacturer said I could file a claim, who knows how long that would take to get resolved? You would have thought "We are sorry" would have been the first thing said. Returning to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: EASY RIDER
customer_reviews.text: very handy. light, easy to move about. goes easily through doors of a small house. comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My grandma loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandma absolutely loves it! Love sit more than her old walker with no wheels and her cane. She loves to sit on it, put her food on it and use it as a cart, and as a walking device.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Comes out of the box 90% together. The last 10% took couple minutes to put together. Everything worked. Sturdy, handy, reliable, and safe.
customer_reviews.author: P. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid roller walker.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 92 year old mother to use in our house. Rolls easily on the carpet and the wood flooring. I put it together myself but I've worked with numerous walkers and knew what I was doing. Might take more time and effort if you are unfamiliar with them.
customer_reviews.author: moraine byrne

customer_reviews.title: Medline walker
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my walker which lost a wheel...place unknown...after many years of use. I thought I was replacing with a replica but it is not the same. It's not very 'comfortable' but, it works and serves the purpose. And, since I'm on a fixed income, it will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this walker. It is easy to assemble and I really like the seat on it. I especially like it when I am at a bus stop and there is no shelter to sit in. My only problem is that one of the brakes doesn't work. I have no idea how to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: stcloud52@yahoo,com

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to assemble and strong enough for my husband
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to assemble and strong enough for my husband , there was not much to assemble to begin with , he loves it and much better than his walker ,,I do recomend this product rose and walter Fritz south carolina
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy built seat, unusable! STILL NO REFUND!!
customer_reviews.text: The seat with very little use broke all the way across left to right! Totally unusable for safety while recovering from two hip fractures! Request a refund. The seat is only about 1 inch thick!
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: ok, could be a little more solid
customer_reviews.text: Does its job but could be a little more solid feeling in the height-adjustment of the handles. And maybe get them up another couple of inches.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Young

customer_reviews.title: I got it for my 96 yr old aunt.
customer_reviews.text: Its just like the old one she had and paid more for. The old one served her well.
customer_reviews.author: wonderful guy

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our son who has Cerebral Palsy, he needs the walker all the time now
customer_reviews.author: phyllis d.

customer_reviews.title: Wheel broke off in 45 days light use
customer_reviews.text: When 45 days the wheel broke off on the lft side, weight was not a problem with the wheel, was only used light duty around house and the weight was under 200, dont know where to get wheel replacement. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JR BEIQUE CT

customer_reviews.title: This was the best thing I have ever gotten for myself
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I have ever gotten for myself, It helps me walk and my posture is straight when I use it and not bent to the side with a cane.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Miyagi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It is too heavy for me to personally get it out of my car so I need someone to help me. I think it is great value and it really helped me in my time of need.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweights, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my husband when he had a stroke, but ended up using it to when I fell and broke my ankle, it is great to carry with you in car, rolls easily to the grocery store and to doctors, pull right up to table to use as chair, and love the locking handles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provides The Assistance I Need.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, I did it myself. A tad heavy but I can get it in the car. Very sturdy & well built. I feel safe!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, easy maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: I had injured my knee and this rollator with the seat made it really easy to get around. For use in the house, I put a basket on the seat, kind of makes it like a shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: diane c quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 88 year old mom Who feels a bit unsteady at times on her feet. Easily folds open and practically no assembly. Was done in less than 5 minutes. She loves this. Glides so easy. Makes her and I feel a bit more secure. Nice color. Folds for my car.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY HICKEY

customer_reviews.title: Good hut could be better
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are easy to slide when the brakes are on. Not that easy to fold, needs a lever or small lip to grab. The materials and finish are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One for my mom and one for my aunt. They are both very heavy and these have held up through everything. We still to this day have them. Never had an issue of them falling apart or breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Called Medline and they were pretty good regarding may send a replacement part but
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for 5 months and a wheel fell off, ball bearings rolling across floor, etc. Unhappy. Called Medline and they were pretty good regarding may send a replacement part but............. I am out of state and the senior citizen (all of 90 pounds) is 1,500 miles away. A new part/wheel is not a solution. Model MDS86850ES Rollator.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great. I like it a lot good price too.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie taylor

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom and she hated the idea but when she got sick her mind was changed.
customer_reviews.author: Blackipods

customer_reviews.title: Missing one handlebar bolt assembly need a replacement
customer_reviews.text: When the shipping box arrived it had a 3 by 3 inch hole in it and the Walker was missing one handlebar bolt assembly I am not sending back the Walker because I like it all I need is a bolt assembly for 1 handlebar thank you
customer_reviews.author: ernest l. hamm

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We give it to my aunt and she is very happy, she moves fast and feels more secure
customer_reviews.author: Cristina C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! My Dad loves it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My Dad loves it. We found it to be very easy to assemble. Some mentioned the brakes being sticky but we didn't have that problem. I will have to update the review once he has used it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I fell with this one as the wheel would not roll over the sidewalk and I fell in top of it and had to go for emergency
customer_reviews.author: superkraftykid

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 86 year old father who's fallen several ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 86 year old father who's fallen several times. Price was around $30 less than the same ones at medical store in town
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. Thought I’d write this review for those of us who live in trailers, and mogerlar homes. Works great. It fits through the narrow bedroom door as well as into the bathroom. She can easily maneuver it, then uses her larger walker for the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to assemble, very sturdy, seat is comfortable, price is reasonable. Recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic! Took 2 of them on a cruise to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Took 2 of them on a cruise to Alaska for the 2 of us and they were everything we had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Potere

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my mother-in-law
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this walker for my mother-in-law who cannot walk long distances or stand for long periods of time. She loves it! It gives her more mobility, a comfortable place to sit and makes her feel more stable. I would definitely order again and recommend this product. Shipping was fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my mom and she's happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell D

customer_reviews.title: Great product and sooo easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Well made product and has all the bells and whistles. Less than 10-minutes to put together. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman's

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost everyday. I use it mostly when I leave home. Moves easily, has a comfortable seat, brakes work well.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and super fast delivery! I bought this for my mom and she loves it. Very light weight and easy to maneuver!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Collins

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the seat was too small but the company took it back with no problems
customer_reviews.author: ret-af 1985

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. Two pieces wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Deverts

customer_reviews.title: The walker is OK. Brake lock is way to ...
customer_reviews.text: The walker is OK. Brake lock is way to hard to set! My biggest complaint is $20 s&h on a $50 item!!!
customer_reviews.author: william weber

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, however sturdy and keeps be balanced and safe to get out and about
customer_reviews.author: critter jane

customer_reviews.title: Great transport for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second transport. Easy to fold, lift and place in car. Great turning radius. Nice seat and storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Nice look to it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Mom but she didn’t get to use it. Solid and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This allows me to be outside and go for longer walks.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bjaastad

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This rollator is very easy to use, fold, lift and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Like it !
customer_reviews.text: Great value ! Its very sturdy, and well made. It was so easy to put together, only took about 15 minutes. My only complaint is that I wish it had some sort of lock or latch to keep it from opening when its folded up. Also, its not easy to put it in the car. My car has a large trunk, but this still doesn't fit in it.... I have to lay it on the back seat. Glad I don't need it all the time, just on grass or other uneven surfaces, on which it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: KatKap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to get my husband outside walking
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to get my husband outside walking. He is on oxygen 24x7 because of his lung condition but the major problem is that he is very de-conditioned from too much sitting and napping. With the rollator he can sit whenever he is out of breath.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Omaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Walker is as described. The seat is a bonus for tired legs.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Good walker.
customer_reviews.text: Very functional walker, a bit on lite side but mobility is smooth and easy to sit in if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well for my 6’4” husband - had to get another one - difficult to put together...
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, easy to transport, Great quaility
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of this style of walker for my girlfriend. This unit was the least expensive, but the highest quality and ease of use. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Peterson

customer_reviews.title: * DO NOT PURCHASE* Wheel snapped off within first 15 minute of use on smooth outdoor sidewalk. Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, this seemed like the perfect Rollator Walker for our needs. But within 15 minutes of use, this purchase went from great to dangerous. My daughter was using this on a smooth, outdoor sidewalk when a back wheel snapped completely off, causing her to stumble and almost fall to the ground. I would recommend this walker for limited, indoor, carpeted use only as the wheels are made from smooth and inexpensive plastic material. - Easy to assemble - Easy to fold for transport - Brakes engage and disengage easily - Seat is comfortable - Wheels break easily - Device should be used indoors only
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: its'great...but
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it but needs longer handles to adjust to height.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Edmiston

product_meta.title: Medline Rollator Walker with Seat, Durable Steel Folding Rolling walker with 6" Wheels, Burgundy
product_meta.description: A rollator allows you to safely walk along or sit on the padded seat if you become tired. Unlike a regular walker, a rollator doesn’t involve the lift that a normal medical walker requires, making walking a smoother process. The Medline Steel rolling walker features 6 inch wheels, a padded seat with a storage bag underneath, and height adjustable hand grips. Supports up to 350 lbs, and weighs 19 lbs.
feature_bullets: This Medline medical rolling walker is made of strong, durable steel and its reinforced frame supports users weighing up to 350 pounds
Rollator walker is light (weighing just 19 lbs.) and folds flat for easy storage and transportation
Smooth rolling 6" wheels are perfect for use indoors or on smooth surfaces
Grip handles adjust from 31" to 35" allowing users a more customized fit; Width between handles is 17.5" | Seat height is 20.5"
The padded seat and backrest allow users to sit and rest comfortably | Ideal for seniors
Overall width - 24.5" | Inside width - 17.5" | Height - 31"-35" | Seat 12"x12"

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
